Detailed Description

abstract base class of objects that process incoming remote method calls.

virtual DataBlockWriter SystemsBiologyWorkbench::Receiver::receive (  Integer    fromModuleId,
Integer    service,
Integer    method,
DataBlockReader    args
)  [pure virtual]
 

process incoming call.

Parameters:
fromModuleId  the numeric module instance identifier of the module instance that made the call.
service  the numeric service identifier of the called service.
method  the numeric method identifier of the method called.
args  data block containing the argument data for the call.
Returns:
data block containing the result data from the call.
